title: Thank you Riot
body:
I was upset when you took the CDR = Attack speed mechanic away from Azir so I thought my scaling CDR runes were a waste of IP, then you introduced new GP. So on behalf of all butthurt former Azir mains, thank you for giving us an equally practical use for our scaling CDR Glyphs.

100% calculated

replies.body: How much CDR% did you give Azir?
Scaling CDR glyphs are 0.09% per level each and iirc they scale up to about 1.67% each or 15.03% at level 18 so they actually offer great utility and open up other item choices.
scaling cdr glyphs are like undoubtedly the 2nd/3rd best glyphs in the game. if you have more than 2 rune pages you really should be using them

... BAKA!

Fiora works so well with scaling now, you buy the cdr masteries instead of attackspeed also, and you just laugh as you melt your opponent in lane. (very very useful at lv 9) She now is a caster anyway
